ComicInfo.Summary:
This issue’s cover is presented in a special sideways format.
Beaten, Broken and Trapped in the Green, how can Alec Holland possibly prevail against the combined armies of The Rot, The Grey and the RITHM? It is a force no Avatar could possibly face alone! Prepare the Army of The Green! The Final Battle is Here featuring Avatars both familiar and new! The epic conclusion to “The Machine Queen”
